Worked great! Open the loader and install using default drivers. The loader will close and hang for just a second, then prompt you to restart your computer. When you do and it's up again, choose to activate your windows license. This will take you to a microsoft webpage where it will read the certificate you have installed and verify it's authenticity. That's it!

I tried EVERY patch on TPB.

This is the only one that worked for me :)

Worked perfectly. Just run the programme then after the restart and login go to the microsoft website and run the validate genuine microsoft software check. It will take several minutes but mine came back as validation successful! Sir and/or madam, you are a genius!! Many thanks  :o)
